select wa.id as id, p.`name` as productName, p.model as productModel, c.`name` as companyName, wa.apply_info as applyInfo, wa.apply_status as applyStatus, wa.apply_time as applyTime from sp_worker_aptitude wa left join sp_product p on wa.product_id = p.id left join sp_company c on p.company_id = c.id where wa.worker_id = #{workerId}
and applyStatus = #{applyStatus}
